name: FUERZA MÁGICA INTERGALÁCTICA
description:
Hi there!

This translation was brought to you by a small Colombian team. This is Fredy, Natalia, Christian, and Luna. We are currently studying our undergraduate degree on Philology and Languages at Universidad Nacional de Colombia. We are first-timers in EN>ES translation, and we hope you enjoy it! :)
